dataAdmin.title: Data Administration
dataAdmin.subtitle: Manage application data loaded from JSON files
dataAdmin.jsonBasedDataDescription: All application data is loaded from /src/data/app-data.json into persistent KV storage. Changes you make in the app are saved to KV storage and persist between sessions.
dataAdmin.exportCurrentDataDescription: Download all current data as a JSON file
dataAdmin.exportDataInfo: This will export all data currently in KV storage, including any modifications you've made.
dataAdmin.resetToDefaultDescription: Clear all data and reload from JSON file
dataAdmin.resetDataInfo: This will delete all data from KV storage. Refresh the page to reload the default data from app-data.json.
dataAdmin.loadFromJsonDescription: On first load, data is read from /src/data/app-data.json
dataAdmin.storeInKvDescription: Data is written to persistent KV storage
dataAdmin.useInAppDescription: Components read from and write to KV storage via hooks
dataAdmin.persistChangesDescription: All changes persist between sessions automatically
dataAdmin.dataClearedSuccessDescription: Refresh the page to reload default data from JSON
dataAdmin.dataExportedSuccessDescription: Your data has been downloaded as a JSON file
dataAdmin.foundKeysDescription: Check the console for full list

performanceTest.title: Performance Testing
performanceTest.subtitle: Test system performance with large datasets and measure response times
performanceTest.alertDescription: This testing suite helps identify performance bottlenecks by generating large datasets and measuring rendering times, memory usage, and system responsiveness. Use this to validate optimizations like virtual scrolling and adaptive polling.
performanceTest.optimizationFeaturesDescription: Features implemented to improve performance at scale
performanceTest.virtualScrollingDescription: Only renders visible items in large lists, dramatically reducing DOM nodes and improving render performance for lists with 10,000+ items.
performanceTest.adaptivePollingDescription: Intelligently adjusts polling intervals based on success/error rates and network status, reducing unnecessary requests and battery usage.
performanceTest.memoizedComponentsDescription: React.memo and useMemo prevent unnecessary re-renders of expensive components.
performanceTest.lazyLoadingDescription: Code-splitting ensures only required components load initially, reducing initial bundle size.
performanceTest.indexedDBDescription: Fast local storage for offline capability and reduced network dependency.
performanceTest.debouncingDescription: Input handlers are debounced to minimize expensive operations during rapid user input.

translationDemo.title: Translation & Internationalization Demo
translationDemo.subtitle: Multi-language support across the entire platform
translationDemo.statusDescription: See which components have translation support
translationDemo.fullyTranslatedDescription: All text is using translation keys
translationDemo.dynamicLanguageSwitchingDescription: Change language without page reload using Redux state management
translationDemo.translationCachingDescription: Translations are cached in memory for instant access
translationDemo.fallbackSupportDescription: Falls back to English if translation is missing
translationDemo.interpolationDescription: Support for dynamic values in translations (e.g., {{name}}, {{count}})
translationDemo.pluralizationDescription: Handle singular/plural forms correctly in each language
translationDemo.dateFormattingDescription: Locale-aware formatting for dates, numbers, and currencies
